attributes.action: give one-to-one support to carers of Dementia sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Mr Brown has announced the plan to give one-to-one care to cancer sufferers I feel it right to ask why the same is not being done for sufferers of Dementia and their carers.  Come on Mr Brown, recognise there is a desperate need for this.
